message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset. I'm willing to sell it to you for $14000.

I appreciate your enthusiasm, but I'm not sure I'm willing to pay $14000 for the product. I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to make sure it's a good deal for me.
I understand that $9000 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to compromise. I can do $11000, which is a good deal for both of us. I'm confident you'll find it reasonable.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $11000 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, so I'm going to offer $10500. I'm hoping we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I'm still not sure I'm comfortable with $10500. I'm willing to go a bit higher, but I think $11500 is my absolute maximum. I'm hoping we can make a deal at this price.
